title: Peter Smith - Compassion Audiostrobe CD [FLAC]
description:
Audiostrobe CD for those of you with Audiostrobe compatible Light and Sound Machines. 

Compassion' starts with Whaling, an homage to those lovely beings in the oceans, who are still singing their moving songs - the whales. The album continues with Rebirth - very relaxing sounds of (among others) choir, flute and a little bird: a wren. The next song, Grace, is rather different, starting with intriguing synth-sounds and some rhythm, with nice melodies following. In Compassion you will find a lot of different atmospheres, with overtones, mouth-harp and choir, some rhythm, thunderstorm and rain, and a beautiful theme at the end. Peace starts full of expectation, fulfilled by the calming sounds of flowing water, nice arpeggios and a peaceful melody; a feminine calling is answered by uplifting themes. In the last song, Reunion, there are several powerful parts as well as softer ones, with appealing sounds from nature: melting ice, dolphins, gulls.

reference libFLAC 1.3.1 20141125

Secure rip. Log included
